answerText: "Everything that Rises Must Converge"[10] Flannery O'Connor's collection Everything that Rises Must Converge also contains this story in which Mary Grace throws a book at Ruby Turpin in a doctor's waiting room, which causes Ruby to reassess her Christian life.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 7 | 19 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The climax of this story takes place when a woman fails to find a nickel, so she offers a penny to the young black boy Carver, which enrages Carver's mother. [10] Name this story in which Carver's mother knocks Julian's mother over, which causes Julian's mother to collapse on the ground while on the way to her weight-loss class.
